dd.p: This section covers the principle tasks that you must follow to retrieve the data that is returned by the host application. It tells you how to:

ul.li: create an object for data reception
format results received from the host
place the resulting Java class in your web application

dd.p: This guide is intended as an introduction to programming with the 3287 connector. For a description of the classes, methods and parameters available, see the JavaDoc files that are delivered with this product.
